title: All-New Ford F-Series Super Duty Pickup Takes Heavy Duty Triple Crown with Best-In-Class Towing, Payload and Power
description: The all-new 2023 Ford F-Series Super Duty offers best in class performance right where customers need it with 1,200 lb.-ft. of torque available, 40,000 pounds maximum towing, and 8,000 pounds of maximum payload.
